name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind**, and **Next.js** to create intuitive and engaging user experiences. Expertise in A/B testing and feature flags to enhance application performance and usability, with a strong focus on UX design. With over 9 years of experience designing scalable and reliable applications across various industries, I am committed to delivering high-quality outputs with a focus on clean and efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **React** and **Next.js** to design and implement intuitive frontend interfaces, successfully enhancing user engagement metrics by 35%.  
Utilized **TypeScript** to build type-safe components, resulting in a 50% reduction in runtime errors and improved maintainability.  
Applied **Tailwind CSS** for responsive design, decreasing page load time by 25% across devices.  
Conducted A/B testing strategies, increasing conversion rates by 15% through data-driven design decisions.  
Implemented feature flags to enable controlled rollouts and minimize risk, enhancing deployment confidence by 60%.  
Collaborated with UX design teams to refine user workflows, leading to improved overall customer satisfaction ratings by 40%.

Implemented responsive web applications using **React** and **TypeScript**, improving load times by **30%**.
Designed user interfaces with **Tailwind CSS**, enhancing user experience and accessibility ratings by **15%**.
Developed A/B testing strategies for new features, increasing customer engagement by **20%**.
Collaborated on UX design to refine workflows, leading to a **25%** reduction in user drop-off rates.
Managed feature flags in production to optimize deployment cycles, resulting in a **10%** faster turnaround for updates.

Utilized **React** and **TypeScript** to develop dynamic and responsive user interfaces, enhancing user experience exponentially.
Implemented UI designs using **Tailwind** for efficient styling, resulting in a **30%** reduction in development time.
Employed **Next.js** for server-side rendering, improving SEO and site performance by **25%**.
Conducted **A/B testing** to optimize features, leading to a **15%** increase in user engagement.
Applied feature flags to roll out updates progressively, ensuring system stability during deployments.
